casebody.data:
Robert A. IZYDORE
v.
CITY OF DURHAM (Durham Board of Adjustment). No. 404P13-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Emanuel D. McGirt, Senior Assistant City Attorney, for City of Durham (Durham Board of Adjustment). Robert A. Izydore, for Izydore, Robert A.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of November 2015 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
